Quick search

(Pseudo-)random sampling schemes on the unit hypercube (sampling)¶

All implemented in d-dimensions.

vkikriging.sampling.halton(nsamples, d)[source]¶

Halton sequence on [0,1]^d of length nsamples.

vkikriging.sampling.latin_hypercube(nsamples, d)[source]¶

Latin Hypercube sampling using uniform distribution on the interval [0.0, 1.0]. Returns nsamples x d array of sample coordinates.

vkikriging.sampling.random_uniform(nsamples, d)[source]¶

Random coordinates on unit hypercube.

vkikriging.sampling.sobol(nsamples, d)[source]¶

Sobol sequence on [0,1]^d, skipping first 1000 samples.
